definition: to be spat on in the face and let it dry by itself, not wiping it off (idiom); to turn the other cheek/to drain the cup of humiliation
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: I hate to see his weak personality that makes him simply turn the other cheek.
sentences.chinese: 看不慣他這種唾面自乾的懦弱性格。

sentences.english: I can't believe how meekly the Irish boys took the loss.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信愛爾蘭人能唾面自乾的接受這個結果。
